title: Couldn't resist to show it off !:D - Medievil Twich
body: Please dont hate <3 I just worked so hard for this!

replies.body:
>I just worked so hard for this!

How exactly is there work in inviting people to the game?
its called making 5 new accounts and leveling them yourself for the referals
Basically the what the OP is doing is gloating about how he bothered to refer a few friends.

>
> Basically the what the OP is doing is gloating about how he bothered to refer a few friends.

smurfed them all m8 took 4 eva..., commitment!
